def.name: Present on Admission or Clinically Undetermined

t.name: description
t.value: Calculates the difference in calendar days between the start and end of the given interval.

t.name: description
t.value: Returns an interval of date values extracted from the input interval of date-time values

t.name: comment
t.value:
This function returns an interval constructed using the `date from` extractor on the start
and end values of the input date-time interval. Note that using a precision specifier such as `day of`
as part of a timing phrase is preferred to communicate intent to perform day-level comparison, as well
as for general readability.

t.name: description
t.value: Returns the most recent emergency department visit, if any, that occurs 1 hour or less prior to the given encounter.

t.name: description
t.value: Hospitalization returns the total interval for admission to discharge for the given encounter, or for the admission of any immediately prior emergency department visit to the discharge of the given encounter.

t.name: description
t.value: Returns list of all locations within an encounter, including locations for immediately prior ED visit.

t.name: description
t.value: Returns the length of stay in days (i.e. the number of days between admission and discharge) for the given encounter, or from the admission of any immediately prior emergency department visit to the discharge of the encounter

t.name: description
t.value: Returns admission time for an encounter or for immediately prior emergency department visit.

t.name: description
t.value: Hospital Discharge Time returns the discharge time for an encounter

t.name: description
t.value: Returns earliest arrival time for an encounter including any prior ED visit.

t.name: description
t.value: Returns the latest departure time for encounter including any prior ED visit.

t.name: description
t.value: Returns the Location resource specified by the given reference.

t.name: description
t.value: Returns the emergency department arrival time for the encounter.

t.name: description
t.value: Hospitalization with Observation and Outpatient Surgery Service returns the total interval from the start of any immediately prior emergency department visit, outpatient surgery visit or observation visit to the discharge of the given encounter.

t.name: description
t.value: Hospitalization with Observation returns the total interval from the start of any immediately prior emergency department visit through the observation visit to the discharge of the given encounter

t.name: description
t.value: Hospitalization with Observation Length of Stay returns the length in days from the start of any immediately prior emergency department visit through the observation visit to the discharge of the given encounter

t.name: description
t.value: First Inpatient Intensive Care Unit returns the first intensive care unit for the given encounter, without considering any immediately prior emergency department visit.

t.name: description
t.value: Returns the Condition resources referenced by the diagnosis element of the Encounter

t.name: description
t.value: Returns the Condition resource for the given reference

t.name: description
t.value: Returns the condition that is specified as the principal diagnosis for the encounter

t.name: description
t.value: Returns the medication code for the given MedicationRequest
